about_the_game:
ChessCorp is an adventure game that holds players on the edge of their seats with solid strategy and chess inputs. Your character is determined to solve the mystery of his existence and the way to do it is to create your own AI and feed it with knowledge.


During the playthrough, you will solve chess puzzles, but do not worry if you lack chess skills – the game will give you basics in that matter! You will upgrade your AI alter ego with mods and software which will greatly increase your chance to obliterate the enemy. You will also need to explore the world to gather information - gain leverage over your opponents. The ultimate goal is to qualify and win the Grand Tournament, and be the Champion of the Arena! Only this will give you all answers.


The game features:
- a beautiful pixel art environment for you to explore
- a couple of hundreds of chess puzzles on three different difficulty levels
- a great scenario with lots of plot twists
- multiple combinations of building and upgrading the chess AI
- for the true geeks – a command line for your chess AI
